name: The Kokeshi Curse [Lost Tape]
description:
Story:

The protagonist finds a job at a school where, after meeting a group of children, he learns that the school is cursed. After telling her friend about it, they bet on exploring the school for money. It is then that the protagonist discovers the twisted background of the school.

How To Install:
  1. Download the Game from Itch
  2. Extract the The Kokeshi Curse.zip file (once downloaded)
  3. Run: The Kokeshi Curse.exe
Trigger Warnings:
  • This game contains very loud noises.
  • This game contains flashing lights that may not be suitable for everyone.
  • This game contains visual effects that may cause motion sickness in some people.
Controls: W Walk Forward A Walk Left S Walk Backwards D Walk Right F Flashlight (When Available) MicrophoneInteract with Spirit (Not Necessary) Mouse Interact (Open Doors, Pick Up Items, Look) Game On Sale (25$ OFF): Notes:
  • Be sure to follow me on Twitter for random keys to the game!
  • Consider purchasing the game instead if you have a key and still wish to support me.
  • Approximate Game Time: 25-35 Minutes.
  Thank you. <3
